entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Elliot Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 10:03 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow late in the morning and early afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:03 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Flurries beginning in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 10:03 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
